brand_identity.name: ReCircuit
brand_identity.description: Turning e-waste into innovation. A platform that bridges the gap between electronic waste and creative DIY projects.

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and card titles. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, inputs, and UI elements.

mono.usage: Use for budget displays, technical specs, and code snippets.

primary.description: Deep Forest Green - Used for primary buttons, active states, and strong borders.

secondary.description: Earthy Beige - Used for section backgrounds, cards, and soft UI elements.

accent.description: Electric Lime - Used for 'Innovation' highlights, success states, and call-to-actions.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

results_grid.card_style: bg-white border border-border hover:border-primary transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-lg group

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-transform hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-primary hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-4
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white rounded-full px-6 py-4

cards.innovation_card: relative overflow-hidden bg-white rounded-2xl border border-border p-6 flex flex-col gap-4 hover:border-accent transition-colors

inputs.text: bg-white border-2 border-gray-200 focus:border-primary rounded-xl px-4 py-3 outline-none transition-colors
inputs.file_upload: border-2 border-dashed border-gray-300 hover:border-primary rounded-2xl p-12 text-center cursor-pointer transition-colors bg-gray-50 hover:bg-secondary/30

difficulty.beginner: bg-green-100 text-green-800 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider
difficulty.intermediate: bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider
difficulty.advanced: bg-red-100 text-red-800 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider

hero_background.description: Green wires close up - use as subtle texture or hero visual blend

e_waste_context.description: Stack of graphics cards - represents the input problem

diy_action.description: Person working on circuit board - represents the process

eco_result.description: Green aquatic plants - represents the sustainable outcome

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Organic & Earthy' theme strictly. Avoid generic SaaS blues.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
The 'Innovation Generator' form should feel like a wizard. Use clear steps.
For the 'Budget' input, use a slider combined with a number input for better UX.
The 'Results' page should look like a Pinterest board of ideas.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states that include a slight lift (-translate-y-1) and shadow increase.
Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Pick icons that are rounded and friendly.
Add 'data-testid' to all inputs and buttons.

universal_guidelines.spacing: Use generous padding (p-8, p-12) to create breathing room.
universal_guidelines.interaction: All buttons must have a 'scale-95' active state for tactile feedback.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratios are met, especially on the green buttons.
universal_guidelines.motion: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and list item entrances (staggered).
